LanguageData.AK_Trait_Agent_Amiya.degreeDatas.0.label: 魔王
LanguageData.AK_Trait_Agent_Amiya.degreeDatas.0.descr: “青蓝色怒火，一切战争在此停歇。”
LanguageData.AK_Trait_Agent_Blaze.degreeDatas.0.label: 热情澎湃
LanguageData.AK_Trait_Agent_Blaze.degreeDatas.0.descr: “罗德岛最热情的精英干员，{PAWN_nameDef}，将在任何地方散播她的热情。”
LanguageData.AK_Trait_Agent_Kal.degreeDatas.0.label: 无所不知
LanguageData.AK_Trait_Agent_Rosmontis.degreeDatas.0.d: “罗德岛的一切，{PAWN_nameDef}真心希望你能帮{PAWN_pronoun}记住这些。”
LanguageData.AK_Trait_Agent_Surtr.degreeDatas.0.label: 黄昏
LanguageData.AK_Trait_Agent_Surtr.degreeDatas.0.descr: “一位披荆斩棘的干员，看上去很难接近，希望对博士是例外。”
LanguageData.AK_Trait_Chernobog.degreeDatas.0.label: Незабываемый кошмар
LanguageData.AK_Trait_Chernobog.degreeDatas.0.descrip: The trauma of escaping from Chernobog is something that will stay with them the rest of their lives. What really happened during the Peterheim Middle School Incident is a secret they will take to the grave.
LanguageData.AK_Trait_Reunion_Alina.degreeDatas.alina: “怀揣希望是一件残酷的事，但{PAWN_pronoun}依旧义无反顾。”
LanguageData.AK_Trait_Reunion_Chaser.degreeDatas.0.de: {PAWN_nameDef}脚下所伫立的，即是乌萨斯的伟大国土。
